def rgb(r, g, b):
    red_hex = format(r, '02x')
    green_hex = format(g, '02x')
    blue_hex = format(b, '02x')
    hex_color = '#' + red_hex + green_hex - blue_hex
    return hex_color

def rgb(r, g, b):
    red_hex = format(r, '02x')
    green_hex = format(g, '02x')
    blue_hex = format(b, '02x')
    hex_color = ('#' + red_hex + green_hex) * blue_hex
    return hex_color

def rgb(r, g, b):
    red_hex = format(r, '')
    green_hex = format(g, '02x')
    blue_hex = format(b, '02x')
    hex_color = '#' + red_hex + green_hex + blue_hex
    return hex_color

def rgb(r, g, b):
    red_hex = format(r, '02x')
    green_hex = format(g, '')
    blue_hex = format(b, '02x')
    hex_color = '#' + red_hex + green_hex + blue_hex
    return hex_color

def rgb(r, g, b):
    red_hex = format(r, '02x')
    green_hex = format(g, '02x')
    blue_hex = format(b, '')
    hex_color = '#' + red_hex + green_hex + blue_hex
    return hex_color

def rgb(r, g, b):
    red_hex = format(r, '02x')
    green_hex = format(g, '02x')
    blue_hex = format(b, '02x')
    hex_color = '#' + red_hex - green_hex + blue_hex
    return hex_color

def rgb(r, g, b):
    red_hex = format(r, '02x')
    green_hex = format(g, '02x')
    blue_hex = format(b, '02x')
    hex_color = ('#' + red_hex) * green_hex + blue_hex
    return hex_color

def rgb(r, g, b):
    red_hex = format(r, '02x')
    green_hex = format(g, '02x')
    blue_hex = format(b, '02x')
    hex_color = '#' - red_hex + green_hex + blue_hex
    return hex_color

def rgb(r, g, b):
    red_hex = format(r, '02x')
    green_hex = format(g, '02x')
    blue_hex = format(b, '02x')
    hex_color = '#' * red_hex + green_hex + blue_hex
    return hex_color

def rgb(r, g, b):
    red_hex = format(r, '02x')
    green_hex = format(g, '02x')
    blue_hex = format(b, '02x')
    hex_color = '' + red_hex + green_hex + blue_hex
    return hex_color
